page.title: 12SCHOOLS IN BRENTWOOD
page.content:
Several junior schools of about 300 pupils cater for the age range of 5-11 years.{St. Helen's}is a Catholic school and{St. Thomas's}is Church of England. Others are County schools with no church affiliations.
Secondary schools cater for the 11-18 age range and vary in size from 800 to about 1500 pupils.The{Ursuline} is a Catholic girls school.{Brentwood {School}is an independent boys and{Hed- {ley Walter} is a mixed comprehensive.
The{Chelmer Institute}has 500 students and offers 48 courses including teacher training and degree and diploma courses.
